import React, { Component } from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import '../App.css' import FileBase from 'react-file-base64' import axios from 'axios' class CreateBook extends Component { constructor () { super() this.state = { title: '', isbn: '', author: '', selectedFile: '', description: '', published_date: '', publisher: '' } } onChange = e => { this.setState({ [e.target.name]: e.target.value }) } onSubmit = e => { e.preventDefault() const data = { title: this.state.title, isbn: this.state.isbn, author: this.state.author, selectedFile: this.state.selectedFile, description: this.state.description, published_date: this.state.published_date, publisher: this.state.publisher } axios .post('http://localhost:5000/books', data) .then(res => { this.setState({ title: '', isbn: '', author: '', selectedFile: '', description: '', published_date: '', publisher: '' }) this.props.history.push('/') }) .catch(err => { console.log('Error in CreateBook!') }) } render () { return (

setState({ ...postData, selectedFile: base64 }) } />
) } } export default CreateBook
